statements: SELECT * FROM SpendingPatterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT category, amount FROM SpendingPatterns WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM SpendingPatterns WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM SpendingPatterns GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM SpendingPatterns GROUP BY category;
SELECT user_id, category, amount, date FROM SpendingPatterns WHERE category='Groceries' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, category, amount FROM SpendingPatterns WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY user_id ASC, category DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM SpendingPatterns GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS average_spending FROM SpendingPatterns GROUP BY category ORDER BY average_spending DESC
SELECT user_id, category, amount, date FROM SpendingPatterns WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-05-01' AND '2021-05-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT user_id, category, amount FROM spending_patterns WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM spending_patterns WHERE user_id = 10 AND category = 'Food';
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM spending_patterns GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT sp.user_id, sp.category, sp.amount, br.recommended_budget FROM spending_patterns sp JOIN budget_recommendations br ON sp.user_id = br.user_id WHERE sp.amount < br.recommended_budget;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM spending_patterns ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT user_id, category, amount FROM spending_patterns WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_spending FROM spending_patterns GROUP BY category;
SELECT user_id, recommended_budget FROM budget_recommendations WHERE recommended_budget > 1000;
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM spending_patterns WHERE amount > 500 GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(recommended_budget) AS highest_budget FROM budget_recommendations;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT username, email FROM User ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM User WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_budget FROM BudgetRecommendation WHERE recommended_budget < 500 ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM User WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM User WHERE age < 25 AND username LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM Transaction WHERE category = 'Food' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.username FROM Transaction t JOIN User u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.age >= 18;
SELECT u.username, b.recommended_budget FROM User u JOIN BudgetRecommendation b ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY b.recommended_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT users.username, categories.category_name, budgets.budget_amount FROM users JOIN budgets ON users.user_id = budgets.user_id JOIN categories ON categories.category_id = budgets.category_id WHERE budgets.start_date < '2022-02-01' AND budgets.end_date > '2022-02-28';

SELECT u.username, t.amount, c.category_name FROM users u INNER JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON c.category_id = t.category WHERE t.transaction_date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT user_id, username, email, gender FROM users WHERE gender IN ('Male', 'Female') AND (age < 25 OR age > 40);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Food' AND amount > 50.00;
SELECT recommendation_text, date FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT categories.name, budgets.amount FROM budgets JOIN categories ON budgets.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE user_id = 201;
